STEPS.STEP: Pre-heat oven to 180, halve the tomatoes and peel garlic. Then toss on baking tray and cover in salt, pepper and olive oil. Put in to roast for 35 minutes.
Dice onion and fry in olive oil till soft and brown, then add squeeze of tomato paste and cook for a few minutes to get rid of bitter taste.
Heavily salt pasta water and add spaghetti, then cook for 12 minutes.
Add onion, tomatoes, garlic and juices to blender. Blend till smooth then add a handful of basil and blend till chopped.
Pour sauce into pan and add salt and pepper to taste. Then simmer for a few minutes before introducing spaghetti, add some pasta water to enhance flavour. Add parmesan and a little more pasta water.
